participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emma finds joy in simple pleasures and has a strong connection to her rural roots.
participant_1.background: i enjoy coloring books. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. my husband is adopted.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, Jake loves exploring new ideas and sharing his passions with others.
participant_2.background: i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i played football for a division a college.
